âœ… I'll update the website for v1.9.0 release. I'm using the **docs-writer** and **style-guide** agents as specified in the rules.

Based on the release notes, I need to update:
1. **index.html / index-ja.html** - Change "Coming in v1.8.0" to v1.9.0 with new features
2. **changelog.html / changelog-ja.html** - Add v1.9.0 section (Under Review), change v1.8.0 to "Released"
3. **features.html / features-ja.html** - Update Markdown tab to include inline math toggle information

Let me start with the updates:

```diff
                  &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
                    &lt;h3&gt;Math (LaTeX)&lt;/h3&gt;
-                   &lt;p&gt;Inline &lt;code&gt;$E=mc^2$&lt;/code&gt; and block &lt;code&gt;$$...$$&lt;/code&gt; equations. GitHub/GitLab-compatible &lt;code&gt;&#96;&#96;&#96;math&lt;/code&gt; code blocks also supported.&lt;/p&gt;
+                   &lt;p&gt;Inline &lt;code&gt;$E=mc^2$&lt;/code&gt; and block &lt;code&gt;$$...$$&lt;/code&gt; equations. Inline math toggle in Settings (default: OFF for general use). LaTeX standard syntax &lt;code&gt;\(...\)&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;code&gt;\[...\]&lt;/code&gt; always work. GitHub/GitLab-compatible &lt;code&gt;&#96;&#96;&#96;math&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;code&gt;&#96;&#96;&#96;latex&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;code&gt;&#96;&#96;&#96;mathematica&lt;/code&gt; code blocks with enlarge button.&lt;/p&gt;
                  &lt;/div&gt;
                  &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
```

</details>

</tool-use>
